about_the_game:
Features:

- The sequel to Eredia: The Diary of Heroes, packed with over 50 hours of gameplay.

- More than 70 contracts to complete, most of which can be completed in multiple ways. How you choose to do your job matters.

- Engaging, thought-provoking story, which picks up right where its predecessor ends.

- CTB Battle System with unique trait, combo and finisher mechanisms.

- A brand new Divination system which can make each playthrough a unique experience.

- Hidden karma system keeps track of your every action and how you perform them.

- With over 500 different types of enemies, 400+ Skills, 500+ Weapons and Armor, the possibilities are endless!

- Pick fights at your local inn, hang out with monks who have taken a vow of silence, or take your stoicism to the next level by learning to meditate on skulls. (Purely optional... or is it?)

- A particular kind of mushroom enables you to talk to cats.

NOTE - Although it is not mandatory to do so, the two games are designed to be experienced one after the other. And players who have finished the first game are recommended to export their saves to Eredia 2. Please check out the latest announcement for details on how to export saves.

content_descriptors.notes: Sexual innuendo, dark and crude humor, blood and gore (in limited scenes), psychological horror, swearing and profanity (infrequent)

short_description: A dark fantasy JRPG, sequel to Eredia: Diary of Heroes. Eredia 2 is set in an open-world enemy continent as you are made to partake in a war you are least interested in, but it's the only place where you can find some 'answers'.
